Title: Directs social services districts to contract with non-residential programs for victims of domestic violence to provide outreach and education in high schools
Summary: Directs social services districts to contract with non-residential programs for victims of domestic violence to provide outreach and education to students in public and private high schools; provides for state reimbursement therefor.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing school-outreach domestic violence prevention programs
